entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 a.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
